name.baseName: Stamping ; Stamped parts ; Steel (including plates, components, etc.), aluminum (including plates, components, etc.), aluminum alloy (including plates, components, etc.) ; Uncoiling shearing, stamping, mould cleaning ; All sizes; NESPS2
冲压 ; 冲压件 ; 钢材（含板材、构件等）、铝材（含板材、构件等）、铝合金（含板材、构件等） ; 开卷剪切、冲压、模具清洗 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Pressingdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Pressingdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 本工艺描述涉及钢材、铝材和铝合金材料（包括板材和构件）的开卷、剪切、冲压和模具清洗，适用于各种规格的工业制造环境。这些过程通常用于机械加工零件、车辆、建筑材料和其他需要金属零件的工业应用。用于污染控制的末端管理技术包括各种处理方法，如膜分离、化学混凝、厌氧水解、SBR（序列批次反应器）、MBR（膜生物反应器）、生物接触氧化过程及其他物理化学处理，以处理废水和与石油相关的废弃物，并具有不同的技术效率。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码33-37文件，在完整版文件中第960页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisMembrane separation + anaerobic hydrolysis + bio-contact oxidation process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1
污染物指标石油类的末端治理技术是膜分离+厌氧水解类+生物接触氧化法，其效率为98，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为石油类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisMembrane separation + anaerobic hydrolysis + MBR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1
污染物指标石油类的末端治理技术是膜分离+厌氧水解类+MBR类，其效率为98，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为石油类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
